Projects and Experiments:

Food Waste Campaign

title:

Food Waste Campaign

description:

A social media campaign for Clarkson's ISE (Institute for a Sustainable Environment). They received a grant from the NYSP2I (New York State Pollution Prevention Institute) to raise awareness about food waste and develop a plan for effective food waste management in the community.

Development Blog

title:

Development Blog

description:

A compilation of articles about introductory web development created throughout my Fullstack Development course, put into a website using Jekyll & Markdown.

Real World Digital

title:

Real World Digital

description:

A Facebook Ad campaign made using Photoshop & Illustrator promoting a STEAM educational platform for elementary schoolers.

COVID 'zine

title:

COVID 'zine

description:

An experimental 'zine based on the COVID-19 pandemic, made for my Typography & Design class. Handmade font created in Typetool, 'zine created in Adobe XD.

Menu Redesign

title:

Menu Redesign

description:

A redesign of a menu for Prune, a NYC restaurant. Made in Adobe XD.

Mood Tracker App

title:

Mood Tracker App

description:

A mood tracking app created for students entering college, documenting mood and amount of friends made. Created in Adobe XD for Information Design class.

Life in Data

title:

Life in Data

description:

An assignment for Information Design that asked us to make an aspect of our life into an infographic. Created using Excel & Illustrator.

Rib Animation

title:

Rib Animation

description:

A short animation of breathing ribs created and rendered in Autodesk Maya.

Feelin' Blue

title:

Feelin' Blue

description:

A painting created with a monochromatic color scheme for my Elements of Design class.

Natural Hearted

title:

Natural Hearted

description:

A drawing created with the goal of finishing an entire ballpoint pen.

Glitch Art

title:

Glitch Art

description:

A piece of digital art with assets made in Illustrator, then imported into Processing.

Bezier Curve Portrait

title:

Bezier Curve Portrait

description:

A portrait created in Illustrator demonstrating Bezier curves and how they're rendered.

Have questions, comments, feedback? Feel free to reach out!

Taylor Lee

Welcome to my website, I hope you enjoy looking around and learning some new things about me! If you'd like to get in touch, email me at leeta@clarkson.edu or fill out a contact form.
